categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: B'skott was a male quartermaster for the Sith Empire who lived during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. B'skott was stationed in the Dread Executioners camp on Oricon as a gear merchant.

B'skott first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, as a nightmare operation vendor for the two Oricon flashpoints, Dread Fortress and Dread Palace for two of the Imperial classes.. However, at some point between Game Updates 2.4 and 3.0, B'skott and the other Nightmare Tech vendors were removed from both the Republic and Imperial camps on Oricon as part of a restructuring of the gear system.
